ModMetaData.name: Graphic Chair Overhaul
ModMetaData.author: Bunkier
ModMetaData.description:
Mod that makes your colonists look like they're actually sitting on the chairs!
Currently supported mods/DLCs: More Furniture mod Rimkea Gloomy Furniture Vanilla Furniture Expanded Core Royalty DLC
How to make em work Just load GCO after them.
Conflicts Mod currently doesn't work with Oskar's HD retexture.
